title: Neu Luc Do
description: What if we do it difference
author: Wendy

body.raw:
## Nếu lúc đó 


Nếu lúc đó em không buông tay. Nếu lúc đó anh không lung lay. Nếu lúc đó ta không trốn chạy, không giấu những thứ không muốn nhau thấy

Nếu lúc đó mình đặt lên nhau nụ hôn đắm đuối như thể lần đầu.
Nếu lúc đó mình đừng giả vờ, nếu lúc đó mình đừng giả vờ.
Vờ như mọi thứ không làm mình đau. 

Nếu lúc đó thế giới đừng quá ác độc với hai đứa nhóc. Không thể cho phép mình yếu lòng vì quá quen việc phải gai góc. Những vết cắt chưa lành được rồi lại gồng mình, chẳng còn biết khóc. Và nếu em không, và nếu em không. 

Và nếu lúc đó em không ám ảnh một ngày anh sẽ biến mất. Và nếu lúc đó anh cho em thấy em luôn là người duy nhất. Và nếu lúc đó mà em tin anh, mà anh tin em, mà ta tin nhau. Liệu mình sẽ còn ở bên nhau? 

Cười mỗi khi nghe thấy tên nhau, liệu mình đang còn đắm say, đắm say. Như ngày đầu tiên mình đến bên nhau? Ngày em đã thức hàng đêm để nguyện cầu. Ngày em tự hứa dù có thế nào, em sẽ vẫn yêu anh. Liệu mình còn yêu?


Nếu lúc đó ta không buông tay. Nếu lúc đó ta không trốn chạy. Và nếu lúc đó mình đừng như thế.

Có lẽ. 

Nhưng có lẽ mọi thứ đã phải diễn ra như vậy để em thấy em phải yêu mình. Đã đến lúc em phải nhận ra em đã luôn tự lừa dối con tim. Vì nếu anh muốn, anh đã tìm cách, nhưng anh chẳng hề gì, yeah...

Em ghét cái cách em luôn bào chữa cho mọi lần anh vô tâm. Em ghét cái cách em nói em vẫn ok khi em tủi hờn. Ghét dư luận tàn nhẫn, ghét nghĩ đến anh nhiều quá mức. Ghét việc phải giữ im lặng, tỏ ra mình không vướng bận

Nhưng em cũng không ít lần gây ra những lỗi lầm, thứ lỗi cho em. Hứa với anh những điều giờ chỉ là ảo mộng, thứ lỗi cho em. Bước đi vì em phải cần tự chữa lành mình, thứ lỗi cho em. Cho phép mình nhận tình yêu mới đến rồi, thứ lỗi cho em. Tập chịu trách nhiệm cho cảm xúc của mình, thứ lỗi cho em. Trân trọng những gì em đang có, yeah, thứ lỗi cho em, yeah. Em mong anh cũng vậy

Để một ngày mình sẽ lại đến bên nhau. Một ngày mình sẽ lại đến bên nhau. Cười khi bắt gặp ánh mắt nhau. Dù mình sẽ không còn đắm say, đắm say. Như ngày đầu tiên mình đến bên nhau. Nhưng mình có thể làm quen lại từ đầu. Chẳng còn một nỗi sợ hãi hay nghi ngờ nào nữa đâu
Anh thấy sao? 


## If at that time

If at that time you don't let go. If at that time I don't waver. If at that time we don't run away, don't hide what we don't want each other to see.

If at that time we put on each other a passionate kiss as if for the first time.
If at that time we don't pretend, if at that time we don't pretend.
As if nothing hurts us.

If at that time the world isn't too cruel to the two kids. Can't allow ourselves to be weak because we're too used to being sharp. The wounds that haven't healed yet are endured again, no longer knowing how to cry. And if you don't, and if you don't.

And if at that time you don't haunt the thought that one day I'll disappear. And if at that time you show me that you're always the one. And if at that time you believe me, and if I believe you, and if we trust each other. Will we still be together?

Laughing every time we hear each other's names, are we still intoxicated, intoxicated? Like the first day we came together? The day you stayed up every night to pray. The day you promised yourself that no matter what, you would still love me. Will we still love?

If at that time we don't let go. If at that time we don't run away. And if at that time we don't act like that.

Maybe!

But maybe everything had to happen that way for me to realize I had to love myself. It's time for me to admit that I've always deceived my heart. Because if you wanted to, you would have found a way, but you didn't, yeah...

I hate the way I always defend every time you're indifferent. I hate the way I say I'm okay when I'm hurt. Hate the merciless public opinion, hate thinking too much about you. Hate having to keep silent, pretending not to be affected

But I've made mistakes many times, blaming myself. Forgiving myself for things I promised to you. Taking steps because I need to heal myself, forgiving myself. Allowing myself to embrace new love, forgiving myself. Taking responsibility for my emotions, forgiving myself. Appreciating what I have, yeah, forgiving myself, yeah. I hope you do too.

So that one day we will be back together. One day we will be back together. Smiling when we catch each other's gaze. Even if we won't be intoxicated anymore, like the first day we came together. But we can get to know each other again from the beginning. No more fear or doubt anymore.
What do you think?

N\u1EBFu l\xFAc \u0111\xF3 ta kh\xF4ng tr\u1ED1n ch\u1EA1y, kh\xF4ng gi\u1EA5u nh\u1EEFng th\u1EE9 kh\xF4ng mu\u1ED1n nhau th\u1EA5y"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:17,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:`N\u1EBFu l\xFAc \u0111\xF3 m\xECnh \u0111\u1EB7t l\xEAn nhau n\u1EE5 h\xF4n \u0111\u1EAFm \u0111u\u1ED1i nh\u01B0 th\u1EC3 l\u1EA7n \u0111\u1EA7u.
N\u1EBFu l\xFAc \u0111\xF3 m\xECnh \u0111\u1EEBng gi\u1EA3 v\u1EDD, n\u1EBFu l\xFAc \u0111\xF3 m\xECnh \u0111\u1EEBng gi\u1EA3 v\u1EDD.
V\u1EDD nh\u01B0 m\u1ECDi th\u1EE9 kh\xF4ng l\xE0m m\xECnh \u0111au.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:19,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"N\u1EBFu l\xFAc \u0111\xF3 th\u1EBF gi\u1EDBi \u0111\u1EEBng qu\xE1 \xE1c \u0111\u1ED9c v\u1EDBi hai \u0111\u1EE9a nh\xF3c. Kh\xF4ng th\u1EC3 cho ph\xE9p m\xECnh y\u1EBFu l\xF2ng v\xEC qu\xE1 quen vi\u1EC7c ph\u1EA3i gai g\xF3c. Nh\u1EEFng v\u1EBFt c\u1EAFt ch\u01B0a l\xE0nh \u0111\u01B0\u1EE3c r\u1ED3i l\u1EA1i g\u1ED3ng m\xECnh, ch\u1EB3ng c\xF2n bi\u1EBFt kh\xF3c. V\xE0 n\u1EBFu em kh\xF4ng, v\xE0 n\u1EBFu em kh\xF4ng."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:23,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"V\xE0 n\u1EBFu l\xFAc \u0111\xF3 em kh\xF4ng \xE1m \u1EA3nh m\u1ED9t ng\xE0y anh s\u1EBD bi\u1EBFn m\u1EA5t. V\xE0 n\u1EBFu l\xFAc \u0111\xF3 anh cho em th\u1EA5y em lu\xF4n l\xE0 ng\u01B0\u1EDDi duy nh\u1EA5t. V\xE0 n\u1EBFu l\xFAc \u0111\xF3 m\xE0 em tin anh, m\xE0 anh tin em, m\xE0 ta tin nhau. Li\u1EC7u m\xECnh s\u1EBD c\xF2n \u1EDF b\xEAn nhau?"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:25,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"C\u01B0\u1EDDi m\u1ED7i khi nghe th\u1EA5y t\xEAn nhau, li\u1EC7u m\xECnh \u0111ang c\xF2n \u0111\u1EAFm say, \u0111\u1EAFm say. Nh\u01B0 ng\xE0y \u0111\u1EA7u ti\xEAn m\xECnh \u0111\u1EBFn b\xEAn nhau? Ng\xE0y em \u0111\xE3 th\u1EE9c h\xE0ng \u0111\xEAm \u0111\u1EC3 nguy\u1EC7n c\u1EA7u. Ng\xE0y em t\u1EF1 h\u1EE9a d\xF9 c\xF3 th\u1EBF n\xE0o, em s\u1EBD v\u1EABn y\xEAu anh. `,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"C\xF3 l\u1EBD."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:32,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"Nh\u01B0ng c\xF3 l\u1EBD m\u1ECDi th\u1EE9 \u0111\xE3 ph\u1EA3i di\u1EC5n ra nh\u01B0 v\u1EADy \u0111\u1EC3 em th\u1EA5y em ph\u1EA3i y\xEAu m\xECnh. \u0110\xE3 \u0111\u1EBFn l\xFAc em ph\u1EA3i nh\u1EADn ra em \u0111\xE3 lu\xF4n t\u1EF1 l\u1EEBa d\u1ED1i con tim. V\xEC n\u1EBFu anh mu\u1ED1n, anh \u0111\xE3 t\xECm c\xE1ch, nh\u01B0ng anh ch\u1EB3ng h\u1EC1 g\xEC, yeah..."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:34,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"Em gh\xE9t c\xE1i c\xE1ch em lu\xF4n b\xE0o ch\u1EEFa cho m\u1ECDi l\u1EA7n anh v\xF4 t\xE2m. Em gh\xE9t c\xE1i c\xE1ch em n\xF3i em v\u1EABn ok khi em t\u1EE7i h\u1EDDn. Gh\xE9t d\u01B0 lu\u1EADn t\xE0n nh\u1EABn, gh\xE9t ngh\u0129 \u0111\u1EBFn anh nhi\u1EC1u qu\xE1 m\u1EE9c. Gh\xE9t vi\u1EC7c ph\u1EA3i gi\u1EEF im l\u1EB7ng, t\u1ECF ra m\xECnh kh\xF4ng v\u01B0\u1EDBng b\u1EADn"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:36,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"Nh\u01B0ng em c\u0169ng kh\xF4ng \xEDt l\u1EA7n g\xE2y ra nh\u1EEFng l\u1ED7i l\u1EA7m, th\u1EE9 l\u1ED7i cho em. H\u1EE9a v\u1EDBi anh nh\u1EEFng \u0111i\u1EC1u gi\u1EDD ch\u1EC9 l\xE0 \u1EA3o m\u1ED9ng, th\u1EE9 l\u1ED7i cho em. B\u01B0\u1EDBc \u0111i v\xEC em ph\u1EA3i c\u1EA7n t\u1EF1 ch\u1EEFa l\xE0nh m\xECnh, th\u1EE9 l\u1ED7i cho em. Cho ph\xE9p m\xECnh nh\u1EADn t\xECnh y\xEAu m\u1EDBi \u0111\u1EBFn r\u1ED3i, th\u1EE9 l\u1ED7i cho em. T\u1EADp ch\u1ECBu tr\xE1ch nhi\u1EC7m cho c\u1EA3m x\xFAc c\u1EE7a m\xECnh, th\u1EE9 l\u1ED7i cho em. Tr\xE2n tr\u1ECDng nh\u1EEFng g\xEC em \u0111ang c\xF3, yeah, th\u1EE9 l\u1ED7i cho em, yeah. Em mong anh c\u0169ng v\u1EADy"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:38,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:`\u0110\u1EC3 m\u1ED9t ng\xE0y m\xECnh s\u1EBD l\u1EA1i \u0111\u1EBFn b\xEAn nhau. M\u1ED9t ng\xE0y m\xECnh s\u1EBD l\u1EA1i \u0111\u1EBFn b\xEAn nhau. C\u01B0\u1EDDi khi b\u1EAFt g\u1EB7p \xE1nh m\u1EAFt nhau. D\xF9 m\xECnh s\u1EBD kh\xF4ng c\xF2n \u0111\u1EAFm say, \u0111\u1EAFm say. Nh\u01B0 ng\xE0y \u0111\u1EA7u ti\xEAn m\xECnh \u0111\u1EBFn b\xEAn nhau. Nh\u01B0ng m\xECnh c\xF3 th\u1EC3 l\xE0m quen l\u1EA1i t\u1EEB \u0111\u1EA7u. Ch\u1EB3ng c\xF2n m\u1ED9t n\u1ED7i s\u1EE3 h\xE3i hay nghi ng\u1EDD n\xE0o n\u1EEFa \u0111\xE2u
Anh th\u1EA5y sao?`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:40,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.h2,{id:"if-at-that-time",children:["If at that time",(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.a,{"aria-hidden":"true",tabIndex:"-1",href:"#if-at-that-time",children:(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.span,{className:"icon icon-link"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx"},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx"},this)]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:44,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"If at that time you don't let go. If at that time I don't waver. If at that time we don't run away, don't hide what we don't want each other to see."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:46,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:`If at that time we put on each other a passionate kiss as if for the first time.
If at that time we don't pretend, if at that time we don't pretend.
As if nothing hurts us.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:48,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"If at that time the world isn't too cruel to the two kids. Can't allow ourselves to be weak because we're too used to being sharp. The wounds that haven't healed yet are endured again, no longer knowing how to cry. And if you don't, and if you don't."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:52,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"And if at that time you don't haunt the thought that one day I'll disappear. And if at that time you show me that you're always the one. And if at that time you believe me, and if I believe you, and if we trust each other. Will we still be together?"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:54,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"Laughing every time we hear each other's names, are we still intoxicated, intoxicated? Like the first day we came together? The day you stayed up every night to pray. The day you promised yourself that no matter what, you would still love me. Will we still love?"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:56,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"If at that time we don't let go. If at that time we don't run away. And if at that time we don't act like that."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:58,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"Maybe!"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:60,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"But maybe everything had to happen that way for me to realize I had to love myself. It's time for me to admit that I've always deceived my heart. Because if you wanted to, you would have found a way, but you didn't, yeah..."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:62,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"I hate the way I always defend every time you're indifferent. I hate the way I say I'm okay when I'm hurt. Hate the merciless public opinion, hate thinking too much about you. Hate having to keep silent, pretending not to be affected"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:64,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"But I've made mistakes many times, blaming myself. Forgiving myself for things I promised to you. Taking steps because I need to heal myself, forgiving myself. Allowing myself to embrace new love, forgiving myself. Taking responsibility for my emotions, forgiving myself. Appreciating what I have, yeah, forgiving myself, yeah. I hope you do too."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:66,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,l.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:`So that one day we will be back together. One day we will be back together. Smiling when we catch each other's gaze. Even if we won't be intoxicated anymore, like the first day we came together. But we can get to know each other again from the beginning. No more fear or doubt anymore.
What do you think?`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:68,columnNumber:1},this)]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx",lineNumber:1,columnNumber:1},this)}function Pn(s={}){let{wrapper:t}=s.components||{};return t?(0,l.jsxDEV)(t,Object.assign({},s,{children:(0,l.jsxDEV)(Te,s,void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx"},this)}),void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/wendywendy/Documents/Personal Project/callmelaura/content/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-2592e5a2-f0e4-4672-92c5-b9b08db7560a.mdx"},this):Te(s)}var Nn=Pn;return _n(xn);})();
